name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Rust Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a robust skill set in modern technologies, focusing on **Rust**, **Golang**, and **TypeScript**. My background includes building high-performance solutions across sectors, integrating identity management and access management strategies such as **OAuth** and **OIDC** for secure applications. I thrive in collaborative environments and adapt quickly to evolving technologies, demonstrating a commitment to continuous learning.

My expertise extends to full-stack development using frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **Vue**, alongside cloud services from **Azure** and **AWS**. I have successfully led projects that leverage AI and machine learning capabilities for innovative analytics and real-time data processing. My foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems supports the development of applications that meet compliance standards, while my hands-on experience with MLOps workflows using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** enhances the scalability and performance of solutions.
